load-sharing.description: Turn on the load sharing and set mode.Its default value which is turning on per-stream mode or disable and generally disable, depends on product specification..

time-exceed.description: Set ICMPv6 time exceeded messages function.

local-destination.description: The number of packets whose destination is local IP.

format-error.description: The number of receiving packets whose format is wrong.

truncated-error.description: The number of receiving packets which is truncated.

holimit-exceed.description: The number of packets whose hoplimit will be exceeded during tramitting.

unknown-proto.description: The number of receving packets whose proto is unknown.

reassembled.description: The number of receiving packet which will be reassembled.

reassemble-timeout.description: The number of pacekts which is timeout during reassembling.

fragments.description: The number of packets which is fragmented.

mcast-in.description: The number of receiving packets whose destination is multicast IP.

mcast-out.description: The number of sending packets whose destination is multicast IP.

local-generated.description: The number of packets which is generated locally excluding forwarding.

dropped.description: The number of lost packets due to nobufs.

no-route.description: The number of dropped packet due to no route.
